text: Thomas James "Tom" Snyder (May 12, 1936 â€“ July 29, 2007) was an American television personality, news anchor, and radio personality. He was best known for his late night talk shows The Tomorrow Show and The Late Late Show. Snyder was also an anchor of the primetime NBC News Update. Snyder died of chronic lymphocytic leukemia in San Francisco, California, aged 71. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:1936 births Category:2007 deaths Category:American radio personalities Category:American television presenters Category:Cancer deaths in San Francisco Category:Deaths from chronic lymphocytic leukemia Category:People from Milwaukee Category:Television personalities from Wisconsin
title: Tom Snyder
